name: Ruin Scarab
movement: 30 ft. walking, 15 ft. burrowing, climbing, and flying
description: The Ruin Scarab is a Large undead creature with a strong build, characterized by its formidable presence and eerie silent movement. Its dark, carapace-like body exudes a sense of menace.
memorable: Its Flesh-Eating Aura targets weakened foes, dealing necrotic damage and hindering healing, while its ability to incapacitate enemies showcases its deadly combat prowess.
goals: To sow chaos and destruction by incapacitating enemies and controlling the battlefield.
relations: Related to other undead creatures, it might be found in the company of necromancers or similar dark beings.
environment: Often found in desolate or cursed locations, such as graveyards or ruins.
strengths: High hit points and necrotic damage abilities, alongside its mobility and stealth features.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence and Charisma, making it ineffective in social interactions and intelligence-based tasks.
attacks: Can utilize multiattack for two Bite attacks that inflict slashing and necrotic damage, along with a powerful Gut Rip action on prone foes.
most_powerful_ability: The Flesh-Eating Aura damages enemies that are not at full health and hinders their magical healing, creating a deadly area of effect.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 90 feet, allowing it to detect creatures without reliance on sight.
skills: Has a modest perception skill, granting it some ability to notice nearby threats.
additional_information: Silent Steps make it undetectable while moving or attacking.
Unstoppable ability allows it to traverse difficult terrain without penalties.
Relentless Pursuit enables it to chase down fleeing targets effectively.
It does not require air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
Can incapacitate foes, severely disrupting their actions in combat.
